summary: After twelve years of imprisonment by their own parents, two sisters are finally released by social workers to face the outside world for the first time.
cast: Massoumeh Naderi|Zahra Naderi|Ghorban Ali Naderi|Azizeh Mohamadi|Zahra Saghrisaz
keywords: family drama|docudrama|contemporary|feminist film|real twins playing twins
title: Sib
